goal: The INC International Nut and Dried Fruit Council Foundation is a non-for-profit foundation established in 1983, whose mission is to stimulate and facilitate sustainable growth in the global Nut and Dried Fruit Industry. INC's vision is to be the international source for information on Nuts and Dried Fruits for Health, Nutrition, Statistics, Food Safety, Government Standards and Regulations regarding Trade Barriers and Agricultural Quality Standards. The objectives of the INC are to increase the understanding about production, processing, marketing, distribution and consumption trends worldwide; to promote scientific research on the health benefits of nut and dried fruit consumption; to cooperate with national and international public and private institutions to promote global trade of nuts and dried fruits.
interests: Agriculture, Consumers, Customs, Food Safety, Public Health, Single market, Trade, Transport
